data.name: Hell Weaver
data.detailed_description:
Upon hearing rumors the seemingly abandoned Lockwood mansion, something pulls Jake, Andy, and Dan: a team of investigators to discover more of its dark secrets. Brett Gerber, creator of Ghostware Interactive in it's debut release "Hell Weaver", invites you to investigate and explore this disturbing mansion and uncover what lead to its current state.
Into the depths of the Lockwood Estate you will you use stealth to your advantage or brute force your way through dark and disturbing entities, be cautious however, you will be balancing your use of light resources to help you survive, but is also your ammunition to fight, choose wrong and this may determine your untimely fate.
Immerse yourself in a eerie and unsettling yet beautiful soundtrack.
Enter the estate walls and work your way through light based puzzles and intense action in 4 dark levels.

data.short_description: A small team of internet investigators get a tip to search a rumored mansion with a dark history. A hand-drawn action-adventure survival horror game through a eerie mansion filled with disturbing creatures and monstrosities. Listening closely will be your guide, light is your key to survival.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Hell Weaver will explore dark content, such as psychological trauma (coping with loss and violence of others), violence, misfortune, and occasional gore.
